aethelburg.name: Aethelburg Station
aethelburg.description: A once-sprawling, self-sustaining habitat that was home to thousands before the attack. Featured advanced facilities, including extensive greenhouses and accessible living quarters. Simulated Earth-standard gravity and day/night cycles.

lifeboat_c7.name: Class-7 Lifeboat
lifeboat_c7.description: Designed for 3 occupants in cramped conditions, lacking any defensive capabilities beyond basic evasion. Its facilities are minimal and not designed for accessibility or long-term use.

haven_moon.name: Uncharted Moon (Haven)
haven_moon.description: An uncharted moon with a thin but breathable atmosphere. Site of a hidden supply cache within a cave system that provided temporary refuge. Experiences very long day/night cycles.
